faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in original packaging with receipt. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 business days) and overnight shipping are available at checkout.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days. Customs duties may apply and are the responsibility of the customer.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and clicking on 'Order History'. You'll also receive tracking information via email once your order ships.

faqs.question: What is your price match policy?
faqs.answer: We offer price matching within 7 days of purchase. The item must be identical and in stock at the competitor's website. Contact customer service with the competitor's URL.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, gift wrapping is available for $5 per item. You can select this option during checkout. Gift notes can be added at no additional cost.

faqs.question: What is your warranty policy?
faqs.answer: Most products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranties are available for purchase on eligible items. Contact customer service for specific product warranty details.

faqs.question: How do I change or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement. Contact customer service immediately for assistance. Once an order is processed, it cannot be cancelled.

faqs.question: What is your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: We take your privacy seriously. We never share your personal information with third parties. Our complete privacy policy is available on our website.

faqs.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% student discount. Students can verify their status through our student verification program. The discount applies to most items.

faqs.question: What is your customer service hours?
faqs.answer: Our customer service team is available 24/7 via live chat and email. Phone support is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. You'll need to provide your email, create a password, and verify your email address. It takes less than 2 minutes.

faqs.question: What is your loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Our loyalty program offers 1 point per dollar spent. Points can be redeemed for discounts. Members get early access to sales and exclusive offers.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer bulk discounts for orders of 10+ items. Contact our sales team for custom quotes and special pricing arrangements.
